body:
A customized file I've used on Ubuntu 10.04/12.04/14.04 with sssd:

    passwd:         files sss
    group:          files sss
    shadow:         files
    hosts:          files dns
    networks:       files
    protocols:      db files
    services:       db files
    ethers:         db files
    rpc:            db files
    netgroup:       nis
